title: $:/plugins/bimlas/kin-filter
name: kin-filter
author: bimlas
description: Kin filter: Recursively looking for kinship between tiddler titles

title: $:/plugins/bj/closedlist
author: JeffreyWilkinson aka bj
readme:
Enables tiddlers inside plugin type containers to be individually viewed and edited. All contained tiddlers are shown as a list

Needs the typestemplate plugin.

For edit, Needs ckeditor with subtiddler extension and multtid tools ($:/plugins/bj/struc)

title: $:/plugins/bj/typestemplate
description: enables user templates for each type
author: JeffreyWilkinson
readme:
This plugin enables the use of custom designed view and edit templates. A field can be chosen by the user whose contents with be used to pick a template. Configuration tiddlers, based on the content of the chosen field, are used to locate the templates. 

The default field is 'type', this enables the user to setup edit and view templates for each type - defaults to non-plugin behavior.

Example: if a tiddler is given the type 'test' then the templates for test can be specified by these config tiddlers: 

[[$:/config/EditTemplateTypeMappings/test]]

and

[[$:/config/ViewTemplateTypeMappings/test]]

ie the pattern is 

```
$:/config/EditTemplateTypeMappings/ + value of type field
$:/config/ViewTemplateTypeMappings/ + value of type field
```

The field used as the key for the template choosings can be put the name of the field to base types upon in the tiddlers

$:/bj/config/typestemplate/callViewPicker


$:/bj/config/typestemplate/callEditPicker

name: Relink
title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink
author: Flibbles
readme: When renaming a tiddler, Relink can update the fields, filters, and widgets of all other tiddlers. However, it works through whitelisting. It's already configured to update tiddler titles for all core widgets, filters, and fields, but the whitelists can be customized for each of this in the configuration panel. See the tw5-relink website for more details and examples.

title: $:/plugins/MAS/DynaNotator
name: Dynanote Notations
description: Add notations to rendered tiddlers simply by selecting text
author: MAS

name: Searchable TOC 2
title: $:/plugins/MAS/TOC-Search
author: marxsal
readme: This simple tool creates a standard expandable TOC rooted on the name of the current tiddler. Unlike a regular TOC, it can be searched. The first time you use it, you may need to click on the large "X" to set up the TOC. After that you can type your search term in the provided box and either type `` or click the search ({{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}) icon. The TOC will be searched, and any branches matching the search term will be opened. This plugin requires Bimlas' `kin-filter` plugin, available [ext[here|https://gitlab.com/bimlas/tw5-kin-filter]]. To use, just insert `<>` into a tiddler that you wish to form the root of a new searchable tree. The first time you use it you will need to initialize it by pressing `` or clicking the large "X".

title: $:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist
author: Tony Grosinger
readme:
This plugin provides a simple checklist which does not create a new tiddler for
each task. Features include:

[x] Check and uncheck items
[x] Simple, no configuration necessary
[x] Easily editable, and easy to read in edit view
[x] Add new list items without using edit mode
[x] Move completed items to bottom of list

[[Source code|https://github.com/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist]]
